text: Heather Elizabeth Morris (born February 1, 1987 in Thousand Oaks, California) is an American dancer, actress, and singer. She played Brittany Pierce in Glee. She was also in Bedtime Stories and Ice Age: Continental Drift. She was a backup dancer for Beyonc√©.
